titleStmt.title: A general and true memorial of what has been done in the city and principality of Orange, by the express order of the most Christian king, since the Peace of Nimeguen, in the year 1678 where may be seen not only the breach of treaties, but also the violences and outrages of the souldiers, which have utterly ruined this principality.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
